title: How long does it to take to be accepted into the PBE?
body:
I was just wondering about when I can get into the PBE actions. 
I have requested when I just got into LvL30 in NA account so thats around 3 months (Or less or more) probably.
I just want to help riot and all of you beautiful players out there to be in a game without any bugs :)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
It took me about 14 months to get my acceptance into the PBE, and about a month to get into the Alpha. (Which I believe they've made it to where all PBE testers are aloud to get the Alpha now, not 100% sure though.)

Just be patient bro! It's so worth!

It's also worth noting that I didn't check my email (that I signed up with) for a very long time and I found it by accidentally searching for League of Legends in my email account. 

So make sure and keep checking and if you ever get on, my PBE name is the same as my Live Client name! 

Hope to see you on the Beta RIFT!!!

There are really unspecified criteria in how PBE testers are chosen. In general, we look for players who are really active and are a positive influence to the community and playing by the [Summoner's Code](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/). 

Sometimes we've sent out invites based on what we're testing, so let's say we're looking to release a champion that is super fabulous like Taric. We'd probably send out invites to players who main Taric so they could give us awesome feedback. 

For complete details on the PBE, [check out our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any other questions. 

{{champion:44}}
